Charlie Grant

  1. Foster Name: Charlie Grant
  2. Foster Family: George and Sarah Ingram
  3. Location of Family: Edison, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Oxford, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: Unknown
  7. Date of Birth: 1886-10-30
  8. Date of Death: 1966
  9. Gender: male
